website_summaries.verdict: Weatherproof 3D shell design, which protects contents and provides internal shock resistance makes for an edgy saddle bag available in 3 color choices.
pros: Sporty-looking bag, constructed of water resistant fabric with taped zipper
Wave cushion provides internal shock absorption
Easy to install via straps and rubber buckle
Reflective strips on sides for safety, plus hook on back for tail light
cons: Nice-looking and holds enough, but some purchasers had issues with the straps breaking relatively soon after installation

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - avoid bag and company. Multiple issues with RockBros, lasted < 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking, good space, just doesn't last. Both straps broke due to poor stitching after 2-3 months of road biking. I cant' imagine this holds up mountain biking. Really sad, as the shell is heavy duty, but the engineer / designer did not reinforce the part of the bag that gets the most impact and 'carries' the weight. FYI - did not over-stuff or abuse the bag, and stuck to 98% smooth roads. Wish I could get my money back. Also bought a rock bros saddle cover that is also ripping at the seams due to poor / incorrectly placed stitching.
customer_reviews.author: MyThoughtsForYou

customer_reviews.title: This bag isnt bad. It's hung on for a really long time ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag isnt bad. It's hung on for a really long time carrying all my fix a flat gear, and not just on rides. I strap my bike to the back of my brothers Jeep to get up the mountain or to work and I never have to worry about it. It's a good bag. I haven't had any zipper, Velcro, or waterproofing problems and I've rode in some rough weather. Good bag. I got the largest size. If you ride a more upright posture consider a smaller size as you might get some leg rub. The lower your saddle height the smaller size you should get.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrad

customer_reviews.title: Great for small items but beware...
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to put on and off my bike. I pack extra tube, co2 cartridges and my multi tool in it. Unfortunately, with all that packed in there during a trail ride on my Trek Marlin 5 MTB the turbulence from the weight inside and riding a trail caused the zipper to open. I lost all of that and had to repurchase an inner tube, co2 cartridge, inflator and multi tool. Learned my lesson and now the I zip tie the zippers together. Small inconvenience for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: DiG Gets Fit

customer_reviews.title: Great saddle bag
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Build quality appears to be solid - Fits tightly to the saddle and seat post with no shaking - Size of bag appear to be just right for a road bike. In other words not too big or small. - Looks great - Bag is big enough to carry essential emergency items such as tubes, levels, tire sealer, tools, etc. - Nice strap for a rear light to be mounted on - Reasonable priced for what you get Cons: None I brought this bag to replace my previous bag that ripped. This bag appear to be much better than my previous bag. So far I have had this bag for a week, I hope this bag is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Runnershigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but not for all seat posts.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this bag 5 stars except for the fact it would not fit on my Santori seat post due to the coil spring housing on the rear. I ended up putting it on my wife's bike that has a stock seat post and custom seat, where it fit fine. Bag is large enough to accommodate a spare tube, and tire repair kit with the needed tools to fix a flat, but not much more. Or you can put several small items in it if you don't fix your own flats :)
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Overall, decent bag for price
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Can't really beat it with similar price product. Pros: No swaying, waterproof 9/10, plenty of space Small amount of water gets through bag and zipper closure- not that big of a deal, just put some wax or waterproofing spray on. I am able to fit multitool, spare tube, other tools, and granola bar in it. Cons: concerned about silicone attachment. Attaches bottom bag to seat post. Ships with extra band in case one breaks. Eventually, it will probably oxidize and snap. Not too concerned - if it breaks, bag can hang on with velcro straps. Would be easy to make own band.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Poor attachment design
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these in Sept 2019 for $18.99 ea. Mounted on 2 different bikes. The one did not last past 2 short rides on the Towpath. The other lasted for about 85 miles in riding on the Towpath. The Towpath is mostly a smooth trail, and neither of theses bags were loaded with anything weight bearing. The rubber strap that is used to connect the bag to the seat post broke on both bags. I suggest that you look around for something that is going to be more durable. Had no issues with the bag itself, however they both are useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best water resistance experienced so far!
customer_reviews.text: This pouch has the water protection. I rode around 90 mins in a heavy rains and there was not even a drop of water inside the pouch. The rubber bottom keeps it even more safe from the accumulating dirt. Just squeezed a water bottle and the pouch was back to being clean.
customer_reviews.author: Unmesh Choudhari

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: First bag we bought of another brand broke almost right away. This bag is tougher, stays up high so no rubbing on the tires over bumps and has solid straps. We also have fit a heck of alot of gadgets in there.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Mountain Biking

customer_reviews.title: Stop your search for a saddle bag here
customer_reviews.text: Great bag that is well made. Inside I have a 29x2.4 tube, two co2 16oz, small pump head for co2, two tire levers, a multi tool, two missing link chain links, and four zip ties. After all this is in there there is still room! No issues with this out on the trail. I have it strapped to my carbon hardtail currently and have taken it out on some rough trails. It did not budge due to the well made velcro and rubber fastener system used. I would highly recommend this bag to any trail or road rider.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J Muldoon

customer_reviews.title: Tough Bag, Secures Tightly, No Sway when Riding
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY thing I don’t like is that the bag “touches” the back of my thigh on each downstroke. However, this might just be the way my seat is positioned relative to my body position when riding. I think the dimensions are slightly wider at the seat post than my previous bag by Transit. This is a nice bag and an upgrade from my previous Transit bag (Transit Zipper Broke). If you are a minimalist, you may not like the size and extra half a gram in weight, but if you are a regular roadie (or MTB) that likes having a reliable, sturdy bag, this is a nice choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent construction.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and perfectly shape to fit properly beneath the seat and secure to the stem/seat wire frame. When snugged up against the seat it takes a bit of effort to maneuver the zipper - but doable. The straps that secure the top and the strap on the zipper door opening make securing the bag and accessories like safety lights very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk J. Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for 17$ pre corona
customer_reviews.text: I like this saddle bag. its big, and can fit more than just essentials, and it looked great with my red and black jamis. Unfortunately my Bike was stolen, so i have to buy all new equipment. I was shocked to see how much they bumped up the price post corona. What a shame, as i know im not the only one looking for better prices in the midst of this economic crisis :(
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for road bike
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Very small bag but takes up minimal space which is what i wanted. Big enough to fit a multitool, keys, levers, and tube for a road bike and thats about it. Not big enough to fit a tube for a 27.5 or 29 mtb but thats not what i got it for. For a road bike its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: .eagle fire

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a well made seat bag
customer_reviews.text: Looks like this seat bag is made pretty well. Attaches securely to the bottom of the seat and seat post. I can securely attach my taillight to the back of the seat bag. The bag holds its shape, and there is padding to protect stored items. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: F. Han

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I like this way better than any other bags I have tried over the years. It has a rigid construction and I like how the straps are put on my seat. It is a bit smaller than my old bag so I had to not carry crap that I didn't need. It looks cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Lord_Pooky

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: Super quick and easy to install under almost any bike seat. Enough space for keys, cellphone, glasses, etc. Just remember, it does not lock or permanently attach to the bike BUT can be easily removed when you need to park n lock your bike. Cool design too.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: POS. Ripped in 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in May. Broken by August. Had it on my mountain bike. I ride maybe 3 times a week on a good week. Nothing crazy. Was riding on a gravel bike path. Hopped off a 4" rock and this POS ripped in 2 spots. Dont waste your money if you need your saddle bag to last more than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Love the  bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. My two concerns were how it would fit on my saddle since there was only an inch behind the seat, and if it had enough volume for all my stuff. It fits fine. It's spacious w/o looking clunky; holds a tube, a gas charger w 2 cartridges, tire levels, a mini tool, power bar and my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sciguy

customer_reviews.title: Both straps broke the 2nd time I road with it ...
customer_reviews.text: Both straps broke the 2nd time I road with it. Had to ride back a few miles to find it because it had my car keys in it so I had to find it. I would NEVER buy this product again and probably will never buy anything from ROCKBROS either
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C.

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: my bike is a TT bike and its kinda weird so it was hard to get it mounted on the back but that's not an issue with the product, just my bike. besides that it is totally awesome, fits my iphone 8, multi-tool, spare tube, and all the other misc things, so there is plenty of space. the reflective part of it is great for safety and the color matches my bike really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Gary D

customer_reviews.title: Band broke
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used two of these during a 120 ride for MS in Tennessee. The bands attaching to the seatposts broke. The bag material was great, but would suggest Velcro strap for seat post, not rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Parks

customer_reviews.title: Review update: Re: saddle bag failure and return ...
customer_reviews.text: Review update: Re: saddle bag failure and return The vendor contacted me, apologized, and offered to send me an improved saddle bag as a replacement. Very impressed by their kindness and concern. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted/Needed
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying this after a lot of comparing other bags and it is perfect for what I need. My pixel 3XL phone fits if I put it inside at an angle, it is a tight fit but it works. I also carry two small universal tool sets and this is all I need for my daily rides. Another bonus is I bought the red saddle bag which matches my bike nicely (oh yea, my bike accessories are color coordinated).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks good, but....
customer_reviews.text: it's a good looking bag, but like others have mentioned, the straps are not positioned well to connect to my brooks saddle. once installed (which took quite a bit of tugging and manipulating) it's been fine. my biggest complaint is the taillight strap - got back from a ride and discovered that the strap had torn loose on one side, so my taillight had been dangling for most of the ride. have no idea how that would come loose on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID W MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for a nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, bigger size bag for your bike. They attach well to the bike and you can fit a lot in it (works better for bigger tubes that wont fit in the super small bags). Look good also.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect under seat bag!
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect. Fits my iPhone 8+, bike tool, and car keys. Exactly what I need it for. Doesn’t move even on mountain bike/gravel trail. Overall great buy
customer_reviews.author: B Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Not too big, but just big enough
customer_reviews.text: Mounts easily, and removes easily. Large enough for an extra tube, patch kit, tire levers, and a multitool. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Quality is amazing! Fits just enough. 1 tube, tire levers, 2 co2 cartridges and snack/bar of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: Not as large as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because I thought my cellphone would fit in it, unlike my current saddlebag. The description clearly says the length is 9", but its really barely 8" and that's measuring the diagonal. My phone won't fit in this bag, so I'm going to have to send it back. If it was 9" long, as it was advertised, it wouldn't have been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Josephson

customer_reviews.title: Strap Failure after a Month...
customer_reviews.text: The bag seemed decent but the strap failed after a month. I was using it on a single speed road bike so is wasn't hard use either. If you look at the photos you can see the failure point was where the Velcro was stitched onto the strap. I bet if they didn't include that stitching it would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome seat bag, strong Velcro straps, matches bike well holds a to of stuff, quality made. Very pleased. A little bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: gsales3

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and does what it should!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my fat tire mountain bike, even the color! Easy to mount, nice durable materials and enough room for my little tool kit and then some. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: richieoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Well Made - Watch Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product and priced right. I would encourage you to watch the size - I miss judged how big it was.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Weckop

customer_reviews.title: zippers
customer_reviews.text: 1 thing that isn't described, is it has 2 zippers. I like that, because it's easier to open/close. I packed 2 tubes, 2 16 oz CO2 cartridges, 2 levers, 1 foldable tool pack and 1 condom. I like how the whole thing mounts at the perfect angle to get stuff in and out.
customer_reviews.author: travelnperl

customer_reviews.title: Good saddle bag
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses, the tail light strap hangs down. I love the bag, so I added a seat post mount for my tail light. I love the fact that the bag attaches to the seatpost without velcro
customer_reviews.author: Stac

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and perfect fit. Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. I wish it was a little bigger. I like the tail light strap in the back. I put a small hole in the tail light Stettin mount my light and it is perfect
customer_reviews.author: hulk48

customer_reviews.title: Taillight Strap Broke
customer_reviews.text: After a few short weeks the Taillight Strap Broke causing me to lose my taillight.
customer_reviews.author: Idanes Font

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I got this to carry a couple of phones wallet and keys. It was easy to mount. Its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Right One for My Use.
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and easy of installation. Even has a strap on the back to insert/clip back light to. Have nice pockets to keep things in place. Highly recommend this one. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Carm

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our trek bikes. Fits iPhone keys with room to spare
customer_reviews.author: rhyagirl

customer_reviews.title: It looks excellent on my wifes bike and I plan to order ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a stylish bag that holds its shape under the seat. It looks excellent on my wifes bike and I plan to order another for mine to replace the BV presently in use.
customer_reviews.author: Max Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stong
customer_reviews.text: Love the space and durability. It does endure the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge G

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got the medium size and it's still pretty small but other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Preston & Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Inside shredded in a month
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shell, inside started falling apart after less than a month of use carrying only a multi tool and phone. Very disappointed in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well, good space and holds tight.
customer_reviews.text: Bag has held on for 2 pretty rough and bumpy Arizona desert races so far. Upgraded straps seem to be holding good. 4 more races left in the season of it can't handle the season i will repost with an update.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, plastic straps not that much
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag size and material of the bag, I have 3 of them 2 that I bought and one that I got as a replacement (great customer service by the way) since the plastic straps that grabs the seat did not resist cross country bouncing and cutoff, I thought it was bad luck but.. I already replaced the plastic straps for leather of two of them and the latest one I still need to fix it, leather has work perfectly and in addition I put a Velcro support to reduce the bouncing.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Masferrer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Fits and looks good. Not concerned with waterproof as I hope I have sense not to ride during a rainstorm.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Great little bag. Looks good, tough, and durable. Fits two tubes, multi-tool, tire irons and CO2 with room to spare. Fit is tight and sleek under the seat. Love the seat post bungee
customer_reviews.author: Kevin in MN

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice replacement for my old bag that was starting to come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Andy10K

customer_reviews.title: perfect size and built really well
customer_reviews.text: went through a few bags until I found thi sone.perfect size and built really well. I can fit my Galaxy s7, a multi tool, glasses, 2 Ciff Bars and a few gels. Enough for a long ride and it has a clip to hang a light off the back.
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size bag for my needs. Currently having issue with zipper separating, not sure if it's a heat issue with nylon zipper.
customer_reviews.author: xthxst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pack! Replaced a similarly sized Topeak on my road bike and I am very pleased with the construction, internal pockets, dual zippers and post fastener features. I can fit CO2 + Xtra cartridge, spare tube, bike tool, tire levers and garage door opener. I'm sure I can shove my Galaxy S7 Active in there if I needed to. I dig it!
customer_reviews.author: Frizank

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for regular road riding.
customer_reviews.text: Strap broke after 1 month. Company was really good and sent me another. No reason to think the strap won't break again as it is identical to the first one. I bought a different one with between quality straps.
customer_reviews.author: ghutch

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it! Bought it for the STP ride in ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! Bought it for the STP ride in Oregon. It is roomier than expected and zipper is excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Burress Family

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat bag. Easy to switch to other bikes quickly
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Bag it.
customer_reviews.text: This RockBros Saddle Bag is a very good bag for the money. It holds my keys and phone while being inconspicuous.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Fits my purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Cannondale perfectly and holds the right amount of stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: High quality product and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Exactly the right size pack for my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Spruill

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The price is cheap. Yes. But the bag broke off the bike after 2 rides. I expected it to last a tiny bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rahman

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: of very good quality. It fit my bike well, Beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this product. It’s just the right size and I’m able to fit a good amount of items inside. It also looks fantastic on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: L. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality and much room. streamlined, wont get in the way of riding. it has much room. be carefull you dont ad 2-3 pounds more weight to your riding by filling it up ,LoL.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: A Short Sale!
customer_reviews.text: Straps are not long enough to be utilized universally on every seat. Looks nice but that’s not enough to own it. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: flhandster

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but bad first impression for the zipper.
customer_reviews.text: The minute I took it out of the box, I went to unzip/open the compartment and pulled the zipper tab OFF the zipper. The tab looked to be poorly made and the glue must not have held. Not a good first impression for me. The rest of the bag seemed decent. We'll see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The strips that holds the bag to the settle broke less than a month after start using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worst product ever bought last one day
customer_reviews.text: It last one day The robber the holds under the seat split in the same day . The worst product ever Please send my money back
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Arruda

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: I like this little bag,,looks good, seems to be well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Small and out of the way but holds what you need
customer_reviews.author: John V.  Shingletown, Ca.

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and handy. Attaches to my bike seat easily and is easy to remove for bike cleaning and reattached easily. Lots of room to carry things on my bike ride.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Pfenninger

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the bike nicely. Nice mounting system, no worries. Materials feel like good quality. The molded black underside looks cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Odd shape
customer_reviews.text: This bag has an odd geometry - if you have a dropper post on your bike, you might wanna look elsewhere. It takes up too much length along the seatpost. Construction and materials are great, just needs to be skinnier from top to bottom in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline L Ausmus

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been really impressed with how well made this is. I would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Skeel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag and more so the service. Top notch. I give RockBros an "A"+
customer_reviews.author: bernie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits the basic things you need not big and bulky seems well made!
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: not sure if im doing it wrong or what but it definitely doesnt seem to fit my trek hybrid.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market, for the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality and reasonably priced. I purchased two, one for my road bike and another for my cross bike. Plenty of room for storing all the essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Quality bag. I can fit a small bike pump, extra tire, and tools easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn John

customer_reviews.title: BE SEEN AT NIGHT WITH THIS BAG!
customer_reviews.text: Bag is plenty big to hold a large smartphone, bike tool, snack, sunglasses. Very reflective at night too! Great value
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W.

customer_reviews.title: The Right SeatBag.
customer_reviews.text: Like the look, the small net pockets inside for organizing and the materials. Great seat bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Weitzel

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Rubber piece that goes around the seat post broke within a few uses. Was never very happy as my phone didn’t fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Doty

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks cool. However, I had it on my bike for 2 rides and it broke. Almost lost my phone in the trails I was riding. I wouldn't recommend anyone to buy this
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Could not give zero stars. The velcro straps ripped off on the second ride. Do not buy this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It fits under my seat and is perfect !
customer_reviews.text: I need to carry my phone and a snack bar and my car key. For sure the best one yet. It is a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: GEN

customer_reviews.title: Great saddle bag!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and fits perfect. Love this bag for my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, looks great on my new Giant Defy 2 Disc. Made very well and large enough to get my iPhone 7 + safely inside.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyPageLicks

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Really cool looking bag with a decent amount of space. I had an issue with my first one but customer service was extremely helpful and provided a replacement. Overall I am satisfied with my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Kunig

customer_reviews.title: 🤗❤️👌
customer_reviews.text: Great design, fits nice and snug under seat, roomie interior, easy access. Very happy with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lyla

customer_reviews.title: Not for off-road use
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a nice bag but one of the straps ended up breaking the first ride I took it on. It was a moderate single track MTB trail. Only buy this if your using it on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: I would have loved this thing had it not fell apart so fast
customer_reviews.text: Decent size! This thing holds 2 spares, a multi tool, tire levers, and a small flashlight i keep. The problem is the velcro arms tear at the top stitching. I bought 2 for my bikes and neither of them lasted more then a month. I would have loved this thing had it not fell apart so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Hartigan1

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly holds my Moto X Pure (2015), wallet and keys when I am going out for a ride. The straps are quite strong and resist a fair amount of tugs and bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Neuson

customer_reviews.title: Durable and dependable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable it fits really well under the seat. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G.

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: The straps broke within the first couple rides. I had to back-track a couple miles to find it after it fell off my bike. It looks good but it also terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Owen

customer_reviews.title: I like the inside mesh holding compartments.
customer_reviews.text: I received the item when expected and attached to seat with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie LaBove

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accessory
customer_reviews.text: Loads of space, secure and great product overall, very sleek under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful and not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for just under a month and one of the straps snapped today. Awful product! The last saddlebag I had lasted me years. Highly recommend you don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: bmow

customer_reviews.title: Good stop gap solution saddlebag
customer_reviews.text: Works well for 6 months straps very flimsy and eventually broke
customer_reviews.author: Mark Giles

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my 3D bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Perfect size for my bike multi-tool, flashlight and gloves. Durable and fits perfect on my bike A+++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a smaller less intrusive bag for biking
customer_reviews.text: Great for carrying keys, etc when out for a ride.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Fensore

customer_reviews.title: Best looking saddle bag!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nice. Great quality too. After looking at all the saddle bags on Amazon. I picked this one. Very happy 5 stars!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Miami

product_meta.title: ROCKBROS Bike Seat Bag Waterproof, Bicycle Saddle Bag Under Seat 3D Shell Cycling Seat Pack for Mountain Road Bikes Black
feature_bullets: SPECIAL SHAPE:3D shell bike saddle bag with wave cushion provides inside shock resistant protection if fell out
RAINPROOF:Waterproof fabric with taped zipper for rain.Do not soak in the water for a long time( stitches are not waterproof )
EASY TO INSTALL:2 stickup straps and a rubber buckle simplify mount system.Moreover , it keeps the seat bag sercurely attach to seat post
NIGHT VISIBILITY:Reflective strap around the bike seat bag to increase night visibility while night cycling.Taillight hook compact space on the seat post ( Taillight doesn't include in the package )

LIFETIME WARRANTY and friendly customer service. Any questions during using contract RockBros Bicycle with pictures.ARTISTIC:Delicate details- mesh pockets , structured inside can hold cashes ,keys , snack bars and other small repair tools (W 3.22 * L 9 * H 3.93 inches)
